remarks: Elementhood of a preimage (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Jan-2017.)
statement:
orvcval.1 $e |- ( ph -> Fun X ) $.
orvcval.2 $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
orvcval.3 $e |- ( ph -> A e. W ) $.
elorvc $p |- ( ( ph /\ z e. dom X ) -> ( z e. ( X oRVC R A ) <-> ( X ` z ) R A ) ) $.
$d A z $.
$d R z $.
$d X z $.
